אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who הָגְלָה֙ <WH1540> Who had been carried away מִיר֣וּשָׁלַ֔יִם <WH3389> from Jerusalem עִם־ <WH5973> with הַגֹּלָה֙ <WH1473> with the captivity אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הָגְלְתָ֔ה <WH1540> which had been carried away עִ֖ם <WH5973> with יְכָנְיָ֣ה <WH3204> with Jeconiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom הֶגְלָ֔ה <WH1540> had carried away נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֖ר <WH5019> whom Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> become אֹמֵ֜ן <WH539> And he brought up אֶת־ <WH853> הֲדַסָּ֗ה <WH1919> Hadassah הִ֤יא <WH1931> that אֶסְתֵּר֙ <WH635> that [is] Esther בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter דֹּד֔וֹ <WH1730> his uncle's כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֵ֥ין <WH369> had לָ֖הּ אָ֣ב <WH1> for she had neither father וָאֵ֑ם <WH517> nor mother וְהַנַּעֲרָ֤ה <WH5291> and the maid יְפַת־ <WH3303> was beautiful תֹּ֙אַר֙ <WH8389> of form וְטוֹבַ֣ת <WH2896> good מַרְאֶ֔ה <WH4758> and face וּבְמ֤וֹת <WH4194> were dead אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <WH1> when her father וְאִמָּ֔הּ <WH517> and mother לְקָחָ֧הּ <WH3947> took מָרְדֳּכַ֛י <WH4782> whom Mordecai ל֖וֹ לְבַֽת׃ <WH1323> for his own daughter

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בְּהִשָּׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> was heard דְּבַר־ <WH1697> commandment הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> So it came to pass when the king's וְדָת֔וֹ <WH1881> and his decree וּֽבְהִקָּבֵ֞ץ <WH6908> were gathered together נְעָר֥וֹת <WH5291> maidens רַבּ֛וֹת <WH7227> and when many אֶל־ <WH413> of שׁוּשַׁ֥ן <WH7800> unto Shushan הַבִּירָ֖ה <WH1002> the palace אֶל־ <WH413> into יַ֣ד <WH3027> to the custody הֵגָ֑י <WH1896> of Hegai וַתִּלָּקַ֤ח <WH3947> was brought אֶסְתֵּר֙ <WH635> that Esther אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> also unto the king's אֶל־ <WH413> into יַ֥ד <WH3027> to the custody הֵגַ֖י <WH1896> of Hegai שֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> keeper הַנָּשִֽׁים׃ <WH802> of the women

וַתִּיטַ֨ב <WH3190> be accepted הַנַּעֲרָ֣ה <WH5291> And the maiden בְעֵינָיו֮ <WH5869> affliction וַתִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> him and she obtained חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> kindness לְפָנָיו֒ <WH6440> of him וַ֠יְבַהֵל <WH926> and he speedily אֶת־ <WH853> תַּמְרוּקֶ֤יהָ <WH8562> her her things for purification וְאֶת־ <WH853> מָנוֹתֶ֙הָ֙ <WH4490> with such things as belonged לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> gave לָ֔הּ וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> to her and seven הַנְּעָר֔וֹת <WH5291> maidens הָרְאֻי֥וֹת <WH7200> [which were] meet לָֽתֶת־ <WH5414> to be given לָ֖הּ מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> her out of the king's וַיְשַׁנֶּ֧הָ <WH8138> and he preferred וְאֶת־ <WH853> נַעֲרוֹתֶ֛יהָ <WH5291> her and her maids לְט֖וֹב <WH2896> unto the best בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> [place] of the house הַנָּשִֽׁים׃ <WH802> of the women

לֹא־ <WH3808> did not הִגִּ֣ידָה <WH5046> had not shewed אֶסְתֵּ֔ר <WH635> Esther אֶת־ <WH853> עַמָּ֖הּ <WH5971> her people וְאֶת־ <WH853> מֽוֹלַדְתָּ֑הּ <WH4138> nor her kindred כִּ֧י <WH3588> for מָרְדֳּכַ֛י <WH4782> for Mordecai צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> had charged עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> not תַגִּֽיד׃ <WH5046> her that she should not shew

וּבְהַגִּ֡יעַ <WH5060> was come תֹּר֩ <WH8447> turn נַעֲרָ֨ה <WH5291> Now when every maid's וְנַעֲרָ֜ה <WH5291> young לָב֣וֹא ׀ <WH935> to go in אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֗וֹשׁ <WH325> Ahasuerus מִקֵּץ֩ <WH7093> after הֱי֨וֹת <WH1961> become לָ֜הּ כְּדָ֤ת <WH1881> according to the manner הַנָּשִׁים֙ <WH802> of the women שְׁנֵ֣ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> ten חֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> months כִּ֛י <WH3588> as כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> follows יִמְלְא֖וּ <WH4390> accomplished יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> (for so were the days מְרוּקֵיהֶ֑ן <WH4795> of their purifications שִׁשָּׁ֤ה <WH8337> [to wit] six חֳדָשִׁים֙ <WH2320> months בְּשֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> with oil הַמֹּ֔ר <WH4753> of myrrh וְשִׁשָּׁ֤ה <WH8337> and six חֳדָשִׁים֙ <WH2320> months בַּבְּשָׂמִ֔ים <WH1314> with sweet odours וּבְתַמְרוּקֵ֖י <WH8562> and with [other] things for the purifying הַנָּשִֽׁים׃ <WH802> women
